"You did it! You achieved your goal and you should be proud of yourself. Keep up the good work."
"Don't give up. You are making progress and you are closer to your goal than you think. Keep pushing forward."
"Take a break. You've been working hard and you deserve a little rest. Come back refreshed and ready to tackle your goals with renewed energy."
"Remember why you started. Think about the passion and motivation that drove you to pursue this goal in the first place. Use that to keep you going."
"You've come so far, but there is still work to be done. Keep pushing and don't get complacent. You've got this!"
